story_27_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: I can’t believe it. We won?
story_27_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: Well done! That was an amazing battle!
story_27_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: How strange. We lost, and yet I feel so content.
story_27_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I suppose it’s because I was able to battle
with every fiber of my being against such
strong opponents.
story_27_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
In the past, I would always lose my temper out of
frustration from a loss, no matter how good the
battle was.
story_27_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Now I can accept [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s
team’s victory with grace.
story_27_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], everyone, allow me
to congratulate you once again!
story_27_03000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Now there are only four teams left in the
tournament, including your team.
story_27_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Oh wow. There were so many teams to begin
with, and now...
story_27_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
We were so busy focusing on each battle that we
didn’t even notice how far we’d gotten.
story_27_03000/2401_1001_1900_10: I wonder which teams made it to the semifinals.
story_27_03000/2401_1001_2000_10: Do you know which teams advanced, Cynthia?
story_27_03000/2401_1001_2100_10: Yes. Three of the four, anyway.
story_27_03000/2401_1001_2200_10:
One of them is, of course, your team. The other
two are...
story_27_03000/2401_1001_2300_10: the veteran team from Kanto led by Red...
story_27_03000/2401_1001_2400_10:
and the team of Dragon-type masters led by the
Champion of the Indigo League, Lance.
story_27_03000/2401_1001_2500_10: As for the final remaining team...
story_27_03000/2401_1001_2800_10:
Our opponent in the semifinals may just be one
of them.
story_27_03000/2401_1001_3000_10: Hey, Cynthia! About that final team...
story_27_03000/2401_1101_3100_20:
May I have your attention, please. All the
quarterfinal battles for the PML have concluded.
story_27_03000/2401_1101_3200_20:
We will now announce the matchups for the
semifinal battles, to be held at a later date.
story_27_03000/2401_1001_3400_10: Our opponent for the semifinals is...
story_27_03000/2401_1001_3600_10: I knew it! Lear made it this far, too!
story_27_03000/2401_1001_3700_10: And we finally get to face off against him next!
story_27_03000/2401_1001_3800_10:
Now we can pick up where we left off in our
battle with him, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_27_03000/2401_0401_4000_10:
We sure will! But I bet Lear is far stronger now
than he was before.
story_27_03000/2401_0401_4100_10:
We’re going to have to give it all we’ve got if we
want to win.
story_27_03000/2401_0402_4300_10:
I know just how you feel! Given all we’ve been
through, we know how strong Lear can be!
story_27_03000/2401_0402_4400_10:
But we can’t lose! We’ve gotta do all we can to
get ready so we’ll be in tip-top condition for
our next battle!
story_27_03000/2401_1001_4500_10:
That settles it! Let’s get some good rest and then
begin preparing for the semifinals!
story_27_03000/2401_1001_4700_10: I guess we’ll be going now, Cynthia.
story_27_03000/2401_1001_4800_10:
All right. Do your best out there. I’ll be cheering
for you.
story_27_03000/2401_1001_4900_10:
Keep working your way all the way to the top,
and become...
story_27_03000/2401_1001_5200_10: All right, Cynthia. It’s time for us to go as well.
story_27_03000/2401_1001_5300_10: I’ll catch up with you later.
story_27_03000/2401_1001_5400_10:
I want to bask in the feeling I got from that battle
just a little while longer.
